eu.cqse.check.sqlscript.sqlstatement

Class SqlStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.sqlscript.sqlstatement.SqlStatement

  • public class SqlStatement
extends java.lang.Object
    Analyzes a SQL statement, especially if it contains sub-queries.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> SUBQUERY_TOLERANT_STATEMENTS
      Constant for a set of SQL statements which typically hold a (non-trivial) sub-query and thus should be handled more tolerant in checks on sub-queries.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SqlStatement(ShallowEntity entity)
      Constructor.

      Finds sub-queries which are nested deeper than the given threshold.
      java.util.List<IToken> findSubquerySelectTokensWithoutParantheses()
      Finds all SELECT tokens which introduce a sub-query but are not preceded by a parentheses.

    • Field Detail

      • SUBQUERY_TOLERANT_STATEMENTS

        public static final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> SUBQUERY_TOLERANT_STATEMENTS
        Constant for a set of SQL statements which typically hold a (non-trivial) sub-query and thus should be handled more tolerant in checks on sub-queries. These are INSERT, UPSERT and REPLACE.

    • Constructor Detail

      • findSubquerySelectTokensWithoutParantheses

        public java.util.List<IToken> findSubquerySelectTokensWithoutParantheses()
        Finds all SELECT tokens which introduce a sub-query but are not preceded by a parentheses.
        Returns:
        list of embedded SELECT tokens without preceding parentheses

      • findSubqueriesDeeperThan

        public java.util.List<SqlQuery> findSubqueriesDeeperThan(int threshold)
        Finds sub-queries which are nested deeper than the given threshold.

      • isSubqueryTolerant

        public boolean isSubqueryTolerant()
        Returns:
        true, if this SqlStatement is any statement in SUBQUERY_TOLERANT_STATEMENTS which should be handled more tolerantly regarding sub-queries
